name: Yeet World
description:
Yeet World is a 3D Platformer, where you have to save an out of control world.

As Unity-chan you need to conquer the center of every area to activate the control tower, which will bring everything back to normal and opens the door to yet another out of control area. To do that you need to utilize your own Control Aura to progress through each and every part of given area. But be careful if you are out of control or get yeeted by any obstacle you will be immobilized until you mash the jump button to regain consciousness.

The game was created during the GMTK Game Jam 2020 by a team of 2.

Areas get procedually generated, so there is potential for endless fun.

Controls:

WASD / Left Stick -> Movement

Mouse / Right Stick -> Camera

Space / A Button -> Jump / Regain consciousness

Q and E / LT and RT -> Scale Control Aura

F / X Button -> Interact with Blue Shrine
